
## Mean Effective Invert Change

```{r mean-effective-invert-change, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
meic1 = read_meic(file1, type1)
meic2 = read_meic(file2, type2)
meic.diff = diff_meic(meic1, meic2)
meic.rmse.station = rmse_meic(meic.diff, "Station")
meic.rmse.time = rmse_meic(meic.diff, "Time")

meic.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_meic) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Mean Effective Invert Change Differences at Stations")
meic.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_meic) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Mean Effective Invert Change RMSE at Stations")
meic.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_meic) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Mean Effective Invert Change RMSE Through Time")
```
